name: Pearlhorizon
description: A quiet Banshee who strangles her enemies slowly
story: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. She sing songs of malice that flow slowly like dust. She is known to strangle opponent with a gentle and friendly face.

relations.description: As the weakest of the sisters, Gloomyrain is learning how to become stronger from Pearlhorizon.
Realizing they share the same goal, Haste and Pearlhorizon began to meet often, and got along very well.

specialty.name: Doll Collection
specialty.description: This doll we found recently is in great condition. It almost seems as if it was alive.

skills.name: Nightmare
skills.description: Attacks the enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. When the enemy is asleep, deals additional damage equivalent to 10% of the target's max Health.
skills.enhanced_description: Attacks the enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. When the enemy is asleep, deals additional damage equivalent to 20% of the target's max Health.

quests.mission_description: Let's uncover everything we can about the Homunculi.
In order to get revenge against bad people, I must first escape from this terrible prison.
I should meet up with Reingar's student council president to learn how to make Automatic Dolls.
Making a lovely doll of my own might be safer than I thought.

debuffs.name: Sleep
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns. Decreases Critical Hit Resistance by 100%, and the effect is dispelled at the moment the target suffers damage from an attack.

debuffs.name: Stun
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns.

skill1.name: 渾沌
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、35.0%の確率で命中率DOWNを2ターンの間付与する。

skill2.name: 催眠
skill2.desc: 敵全体に攻撃し、35.0%の確率で睡眠を1ターンの間付与する。睡眠を付与した回数ｘ10%、自身のアクションゲージをUPさせる。

skill3.name: 悪夢
skill3.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、スタンを1ターンの間付与する。対象が睡眠状態の場合、最大生命力の10%の追加ダメージが発生する。
skill3.soul_description: 敵単体に攻撃し、スタンを1ターンの間付与する。対象が睡眠状態の場合、最大生命力の10%の追加ダメージが発生する。
